definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
(of passing time) in an instant/(of a sight) in a flash
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around

pinyin: Xin1 huang3 Dong4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: Xinhuang Dong autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

sentences.english: In desperation, the husband took out a five-dollar bill and waved it above the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，丈夫拿出一張五美元的鈔票在人羣上面搖晃晃。

sentences.english: The quake was felt here too. Our building wobbled for a few minutes, which made me dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 上海有震感，我們大樓晃了幾分鐘，頭暈得厲害。

sentences.english: With a brief nod he was off across the road, swinging his camera as he went.
sentences.chinese: 說完，他點一下頭，晃着他的快照鏡箱穿過馬路去了。

sentences.english: The dwarf rocked back on the camp stool.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒晃回了營地的木凳上。

sentences.english: Look how he shimmies his butt when he walks.
sentences.chinese: 你看他走路時屁股晃啊晃啊的。

sentences.english: Look how he shimmies his butt when he walks.
sentences.chinese: 你看他走路時屁股晃啊晃啊的。

sentences.english: A man wanders down a path, buckets dangling from the yoke across his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 一個男人正走在田間小路上，肩上挎着的桶來回晃着。

sentences.english: Leave a good long piece of thread dangling
The teacher flashed up each word to see if the children would recognize it.
sentences.chinese: 老師把每一個單詞舉起晃了一晃，看孩子們是否認得。

sentences.english: The truck sways wildly, careening down narrow mountain roads.
sentences.chinese: 卡車瘋狂地左搖右晃，從狹窄的山路上急衝而下。

sentences.english: The shaking makes a liquid move deep in the ear.
sentences.chinese: 揺晃使得一種液體向耳朵的深處流動。

sentences.english: Tossed to and fro by the waves, the little craft finally turned turtle.
sentences.chinese: 小船被浪打得遙來晃去，最後翻了個底朝天。

sentences.english: Wind gaps now of some, shake right to shake on the left blown by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 有的現在風口，被風吹的左搖右晃。

sentences.english: Are you wagging your finger in front of their face when speaking to them?
sentences.chinese: 當你和他們說話的時候是否在他們面前晃手指？

sentences.english: Su destroys snow a bit impatient of stretched the hand to the gentleman to read tiny in front to sway to sway.
sentences.chinese: 蘇殘雪有些不耐煩的將手伸到君閱微的面前晃了晃。

sentences.english: Su destroys snow a bit impatient of stretched the hand to the gentleman to read tiny in front to sway to sway.
sentences.chinese: 蘇殘雪有些不耐煩的將手伸到君閱微的面前晃了晃。

definition: to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world
to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
(of passing time) in an instant/(of a sight) in a flash
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
